trans-unit.source: Oracle software hosted on Azure virtual machines
trans-unit.target: Oracle software hosted on Azure virtual machines

trans-unit.source: Get to the key topics that describe how to set up Oracle software on Windows-based or Linux-based Azure virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: Get to the key topics that describe how to set up Oracle software on Windows-based or Linux-based Azure virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: Oracle software hosted on Azure virtual machines
trans-unit.target: Oracle software hosted on Azure virtual machines

trans-unit.source: Set up your first or next dev/test or production Oracle database running on a virtual machine in Azure infrastructure services.
trans-unit.target: Set up your first or next dev/test or production Oracle database running on a virtual machine in Azure infrastructure services.

trans-unit.source: Take advantage of ease of configuration and the ability to quickly expand the Oracle database workload to include new capacity.
trans-unit.target: Take advantage of ease of configuration and the ability to quickly expand the Oracle database workload to include new capacity.

trans-unit.source: Oracle virtual machine images
trans-unit.target: Oracle virtual machine images

trans-unit.source: See [List of Oracle virtual machine images](virtual-machines-oracle-list-oracle-virtual-machine-images.md) for the latest set of Windows-based and Linux-based virtual machine images.
trans-unit.target: See [List of Oracle virtual machine images](virtual-machines-oracle-list-oracle-virtual-machine-images.md) for the latest set of Windows-based and Linux-based virtual machine images.

trans-unit.source: Considerations for Windows-based virtual machines
trans-unit.target: Considerations for Windows-based virtual machines

trans-unit.target: See [Miscellaneous considerations for Oracle virtual machine images](virtual-machines-miscellaneous-considerations-oracle-virtual-machine-images.md) to understand limitations for Oracle software on Windows Server-based Azure virtual machines.
